org.apache.hive.hcatalog.data.transfer

Interface ReaderContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable

    public interface ReaderContext
extends Externalizable
    This read context is obtained by the master node and should be distributed to the slaves. The contents of the class are opaque to the client. This interface extends Externalizable so that implementing classes can be serialized using standard Java mechanisms.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int numSplits()
      Determine the number of splits available in this ReaderContext.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Externalizable

        readExternal, writeExternal

    • Method Detail

      • numSplits

        int numSplits()
        Determine the number of splits available in this ReaderContext. The client is not required to have this many slave nodes, as one slave can be used to read multiple splits.
        Returns:
        number of splits
